          <title>
            <string language="en">Heat conduction in air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitzeübertragung in einer Luft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduction de la chaleur en air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condução do calor no ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conduzione di calore in aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεξαγωγή θερμότητας στον αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conducción del calor en aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows two mugs of hot tea, one is exposed in air and the other is wrapped in a towel.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction of heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heat energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature change</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt zwei Becher heißen Tee, 
wird man in einer Luft herausgestellt und das andere wird in einem 
Tuch aufgewickelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre deux attaques à main armée de thé 
chaud, un est exposé en air et l'autre est enveloppé dans une 
serviette.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra duas canecas do chá quente,
um é exposto no ar e o outro é envolvido em uma toalha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra due tazze di tè caldo, uno 
è esposto in aria e l'altro è spostato in un tovagliolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει δύο κούπες του καυτού 
τσαγιού, κάποιο εκτίθεται στον αέρα και άλλη είναι τυλιγμένη σε
μια πετσέτα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra dos tazas de té caliente, 
uno se expone en aire y el otro se envuelve en una toalla.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
